title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V2\TranslateClient
name: TranslateClient
description:
Google Cloud Translation provides the ability to dynamically translate text between thousands of language pairs and lets websites and programs integrate with translation service programmatically. Find more information at the the Google Cloud Translation docs.

The Google Cloud Translation API is available as a paid service. See the Pricing and FAQ pages for details.

Please note that while the Google Cloud Translation API supports authentication via service account and application default credentials like other Cloud Platform APIs, it also supports authentication via a public API access key. If you wish to authenticate using an API key, follow the before you begin instructions to learn how to generate a key.

methods.name: __construct
methods.description:
Create a Translate client.

Note that when creating a TranslateClient instance, setting $config.projectId is not supported. To switch between projects, you must provide credentials with access to the project.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: config.apiEndpoint
params.description: A hostname with optional port to use in place of the service's default endpoint.

params.name: config.key
params.description: A public API access key.

params.name: config.target
params.description: The target language to assign to the client. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Defaults to "en" (English).

params.name: config.authCache
params.description: A cache used storing access tokens. Defaults to a simple in memory implementation.

params.name: config.authCacheOptions
params.description: Cache configuration options.

params.name: config.authHttpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests specifically for authentication.

params.name: config.credentialsFetcher
params.description: A credentials fetcher instance.

params.name: config.httpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests. Only valid for requests sent over REST.

params.name: config.keyFile
params.description: The contents of the service account credentials .json file retrieved from the Google Developer's Console. Ex: json_decode(file_get_contents($path), true).

params.name: config.keyFilePath
params.description: The full path to your service account credentials .json file retrieved from the Google Developers Console.

params.name: config.requestTimeout
params.description: Seconds to wait before timing out the request. Defaults to 0 with REST and 60 with gRPC.

params.name: config.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.

params.name: config.scopes
params.description: Scopes to be used for the request.

params.name: config.quotaProject
params.description: Specifies a user project to bill for access charges associated with the request.

methods.name: translate
methods.description: Translate a string from one language to another.

params.name: string
params.description: The string to translate.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: options.source
params.description: The source language to translate from. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. If not provided the value will be automatically detected by the server.

params.name: options.target
params.description: The target language to translate to. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Defaults to the value assigned to the client ("en" by default).

params.name: options.format
params.description: Indicates whether the string to be translated is either plain-text or HTML. Acceptable values are html or text. Defaults to "html".

params.name: options.model
params.description: The model to use for the translation request. May be nmt (for the NMT model) or base (for the PBMT model). Defaults to using the NMT model. If the NMT model is not supported for the requested language translation pair, the PBMT model will be defaulted instead. For a list of supported languages for the model types, please see the Language Support documentation.

returns.description: A translation result including a source key containing the detected or provided language of the provided input, an input key containing the original string, and a text key containing the translated result.

methods.name: translateBatch
methods.description: Translate multiple strings from one language to another.

params.name: strings
params.description: An array of strings to translate.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: options.source
params.description: The source language to translate from. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. If not provided the value will be automatically detected by the server.

params.name: options.target
params.description: The target language to translate to. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Defaults to the value assigned to the client ("en" by default).

params.name: options.format
params.description: Indicates whether the string to be translated is either plain-text or HTML. Acceptable values are html or text. Defaults to "html".

params.name: options.model
params.description: The model to use for the translation request. May be nmt (for the NMT model) or base (for the PBMT model). Defaults to using the NMT model. If the NMT model is not supported for the requested language translation pair, the PBMT model will be defaulted instead. For a list of supported languages for the model types, please see the Language Support documentation.

returns.description: A set of translation results. Each result includes a source key containing the detected or provided language of the provided input, an input key containing the original string, and a text key containing the translated result.

params.name: string
params.description: The string to detect the language of.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

returns.description: A result including a languageCode key containing the detected ISO 639-1 language code, an input key containing the original string, and in most cases a confidence key containing a value between 0 - 1 signifying the confidence of the result.

params.name: string
params.description: The string to detect the language of.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

returns.description: A set of results. Each result includes a languageCode key containing the detected ISO 639-1 language code, an input key containing the original string, and in most cases a confidence key containing a value between 0 - 1 signifying the confidence of the result.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

returns.description: A list of supported ISO 639-1 language codes.

methods.name: localizedLanguages
methods.description:
Get the supported languages for translation in the targeted language.

Unlike Google\Cloud\Translate\TranslateClient::languages() this will return the localized language names in addition to the ISO 639-1 language codes.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: options.target
params.description: The language to discover supported languages for. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Defaults to the value assigned to the client ("en" by default).

returns.description: A set of language results. Each result includes a code key containing the ISO 639-1 code for the supported language and a name key containing the name of the language written in the target language.
